{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Pa√üions- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    †
    <PRIZE>fl. 2.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    †
    <PRIZE>24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stahiii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Nouvelie Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    †
    <PRIZE>32. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maiers der Geistl.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Krancken Geistl. oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    †
    <PRIZE>48. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hau√ü-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    †
    <PRIZE>40. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
","number_of_corrections":11,"explanation":"Performed structural and small content fixes to make the XML well-formed:
- Added XML declaration (<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>).
- Fixed mismatched tag: changed the lone <PRICE>... </PRIZE> to use <PRIZE> consistently.
- Decoded/normalized the odd escape sequences (e.g. \u221a and \u2020) into visible characters (appearing here as √ and †) where they occurred.
- Escaped literal ampersands (&) in text to & in titles containing "&".
- Ensured all BIBL child elements are properly opened and closed and the overall ITEM is well-formed.
Counted fixes above as 11 discrete corrections (including XML declaration insertion, tag mismatch fix, ampersand escapes, and the several decoded escape-sequence replacements)."}

Performed structural and small content fixes to make the XML well-formed:
- Added XML declaration (<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>).
- Fixed mismatched tag: changed the lone <PRICE>... </PRIZE> to use <PRIZE> consistently.
- Decoded/normalized the odd escape sequences (e.g. \u221a and \u2020) into visible characters (appearing here as √ and †) where they occurred.
- Escaped literal ampersands (&) in text to & in titles containing "&".
- Ensured all BIBL child elements are properly opened and closed and the overall ITEM is well-formed.
Counted fixes above as 11 discrete corrections (including XML declaration insertion, tag mismatch fix, ampersand escapes, and the several decoded escape-sequence replacements).
